Load cbb conference information

Source: R/load_conferences.R
load_conferences.Rd

Loads information about college basketball conferences

Usage

load_conferences()

Value

a dataframe of information about college basketball conferences.

See also

https://john-b-edwards.github.io/cbbreadr/articles/dictionary_conferences.html for a web version of the data dictionary

dictionary_conferences for the data dictionary as bundled within the package

Issues with this data should be filed here: https://github.com/john-b-edwards/cbbd-data/issues

Examples

# \donttest{
load_conferences()
#>        id source_id                               name  abbreviation
#>     <int>    <char>                             <char>        <char>
#>  1:     1         3             Atlantic 10 Conference          A-10
#>  2:     2         2          Atlantic Coast Conference           ACC
#>  3:     3        46                    ASUN Conference          ASUN
#>  4:     4         1            America East Conference      Am. East
#>  5:     5        62       American Athletic Conference      American
#>  6:     6         8                  Big 12 Conference        Big 12
#>  7:     7         4                Big East Conference      Big East
#>  8:     8         5                 Big Sky Conference       Big Sky
#>  9:     9         6               Big South Conference     Big South
#> 10:    10         7                 Big Ten Conference       Big Ten
#> 11:    11         9                Big West Conference      Big West
#> 12:    12        10       Coastal Athletic Association           CAA
#> 13:    13        11                     Conference USA          CUSA
#> 14:    14        45                     Horizon League       Horizon
#> 15:    15        12                         Ivy League           Ivy
#> 16:    16        13 Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference          MAAC
#> 17:    17        14            Mid-American Conference           MAC
#> 18:    18        16    Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference          MEAC

#> 20:    20        44           Mountain West Conference Mountain West
#> 21:    21        19               Northeast Conference           NEC
#> 22:    22        20             Ohio Valley Conference           OVC
#> 23:    23        22                     Patriot League       Patriot
#> 24:    24        23            Southeastern Conference           SEC
#> 25:    25        26   Southwestern Athletic Conference          SWAC
#> 26:    26        24                Southern Conference         SoCon
#> 27:    27        25               Southland Conference     Southland
#> 28:    28        49                      Summit League        Summit
#> 29:    29        27                Sun Belt Conference      Sun Belt
#> 30:    30        30        Western Athletic Conference           WAC
#> 31:    31        29              West Coast Conference           WCC
#> 32:    32        43            Division I Independents        Indep.
#> 33:    33        21                  Pac-12 Conference        Pac-12
